Void Aegis.Name: Void Aegis
Void Aegis.Description: Void Mode creates a shield that grows up to '''5m / 8m / 10m / 12m''' over 5s. This ability costs an additional 2 energy/s.

Void Shadow.Name: Void Shadow
Void Shadow.Description: Void Mode now renders allies within '''10m / 15m / 20m / 25m''' invisible. This ability costs an additional '''1 / 2 / 3 / 4''' energy/s per ally cloaked.

Magnetic Blast.Name: Magnetic Blast
Magnetic Blast.Description: Enemies hit Void Blast are affected by bullet attractor for '''4 / 6 / 8 / 10'''s.

Void Stalker.Name: Void Stalker
Void Stalker.Description: Void Mode increases Critical Chance of melee attacks by up to '''20% / 30% / 40% / 50%''' over '''5s'''. This chance gradually decreases over '''5s / 10s / 15s / 20s''' when the Operator leaves Void Mode. This ability costs an additional '''1 / 2 / 3 / 4''' energy/s.

Meteoric Dash.Name: Meteoric Dash
Meteoric Dash.Description: Void Dash deals '''+100 / +200 / +300 / +400''' Extra Damage to enemies.

Disarming Blast.Name: Disarming Blast
Disarming Blast.Description: Enemies hit by Void Blast have a '''10% / 15% / 20% / 25% / 35% / 50%''' chance to be disarmed.

Void Singularity.Name: Void Singularity
Void Singularity.Description: Void Mode pulls enemies within '''10 / 12 / 15 / 20''' meters towards the Operator, and costs an additional '''2 / 2 / 2 / 2''' energy/second.

Void Chrysalis.Name: Void Chrysalis
Void Chrysalis.Description: Void Mode reduces damage taken by invisible allies within '''10m / 15m / 20m / 25m''' by '''20% / 40% / 60% / 80%'''. This ability costs an additional '''1 / 2 / 3 / 4''' energy/s.

Rising Blast.Name: Rising Blast
Rising Blast.Description: Increase damage of Void Blast by '''25% / 50% / 75% / 100%''' and it can now be charged to deal additional damage.

Mind Sprint.Name: Mind Sprint
Mind Sprint.Description: Increases the speed of Void Dash by '''20% / 40% / 60% / 80% / 100% / 120% / 120%'''.

Stone Skin.Name: Stone Skin
Stone Skin.Description: Increase armor for Warframe and operator by '''20 / 30 / 40 / 60'''.

Flame Blast.Name: Flame Blast
Flame Blast.Description: Void Blast releases a ball of fire that deals '''100% / 150% / 200% / 250%''' of the Void Blast damage and explodes after '''0.1 / 0.15 / 0.3 / 0.6'''s.

Voltaic Blast.Name: Voltaic Blast
Voltaic Blast.Description: Void Blast creates a surge of electricity, zapping enemies within '''4 / 6 / 8 / 10''' meters for '''100% / 125% / 150% / 200%''' damage.

Guardian Shell.Name: Guardian Shell
Guardian Shell.Description: Void Blast can be charged to manifest a shield that drains energy for every '''150 / 200 / 250 / 300 / 350 / 400''' damage absorbed.

Guardian Blast.Name: Guardian Blast
Guardian Blast.Description: Void Blast consumes 25 energy for each ally hit within '''5m / 6m / 7m / 8m''' and grants them '''50 / 80 / 120 / 160''' shields.

Basilisk Scales.Name: Basilisk Scales
Basilisk Scales.Description: Increase armor for the Operator by ''' 50% / 100% / 150% / 200% / 200%'''.

Executing Dash.Name: Executing Dash
Executing Dash.Description: Void Dash no longer displaces enemies, instead it will open them up to finishers and increase finisher damage taken by '''15% / 20% / 25% / 35%'''.

Eternal Gaze.Name: Eternal Gaze
Eternal Gaze.Description: Increases the regeneration rate of Energy for Amps and Void Beam by '''10% / 20% / 30% / 40% / 50% / 60% / 60%'''.

Rejuvenating Tides.Name: Rejuvenating Tides
Rejuvenating Tides.Description: Increase health regeneration of the Operator by '''1/s / 2/s / 3/s / 4/s / 4/s'''.

Void Static.Name: Void Static
Void Static.Description: Void Mode emits a pulse that deals '''200 / 300 / 400 / 500''' damage/second over '''8 / 10 / 12 / 15''' meters and costs an additional '''2 / 2 / 2 / 1''' energy/second.

Protective Dash.Name: Protective Dash
Protective Dash.Description: Allies hit by Void Dash are granted immunity from damage for '''2s / 3s / 4s / 5s''' and healed '''25% / 35% / 45% / 60%''' over 5s.

Lightning Dash.Name: Lightning Dash
Lightning Dash.Description: Manifests ball lightning after a Void Dash that travels slowly and zaps enemies within '''4 / 8 / 12 / 16''' meters for '''200 / 400 / 600 / 800''' damage. Costs '''10''' energy

Unairu Wisp.Name: Unairu Wisp
Unairu Wisp.Description: Void Blast has a '''25% / 50% / 75% / 100%''' chance to summon a Wisp when it damages an enemy. The Wisp can be picked up by allies to increase Operator damage by '''20% / 40% / 60% / 100%''' for '''3 / 6 / 9 / 12''' seconds.

Basilisk Gaze.Name: Basilisk Gaze
Basilisk Gaze.Description: Increase the radius of Void Blast by '''15% / 30% / 45% / 60% / 60%'''.

Energizing Dash.Name: Energizing Dash
Energizing Dash.Description: Void Dash creates a zone of energy for '''4 / 4 / 5 / 5 / 6 / 8''' seconds. Allies passing through the zone gain '''3 / 3 / 4 / 4 / 5 / 5''' energy/second for '''10 / 15 / 20 / 22 / 25 / 30''' seconds.

Inner Gaze.Name: Inner Gaze
Inner Gaze.Description: Increase Energy for Amps and Void Beam by '''10% / 20% / 30% / 40% / 40%'''.

Void Regen.Name: Void Regen
Void Regen.Description: Void Mode heals '''+4 / +8 / +16 / +25''' health/s. This ability costs an additional 2 energy/s.

Sonic Dash.Name: Sonic Dash
Sonic Dash.Description: Void Dash no longer displaces enemies, instead it emits a shockwave '''8m / 10m / 12m / 14m''' wide and travels '''2m / 4m / 6m / 8m''' stunning any enemy it hits.

Sundering Dash.Name: Sundering Dash
Sundering Dash.Description: Using Void Dash through an enemy will reduce their armor by '''10% / 20% / 30% / 40% / 50% / 75%'''.

Void Strike.Name: Void Strike
Void Strike.Description: On leaving Void Mode the next '''1 / 1 / 2 / 4 / 6 / 8''' attacks deal '''5% / 7% / 8% / 10% / 11% / 12%''' additional damage for every second spent cloaked. Cloak consumes '''2''' additional energy per second.

Energy Pulse.Name: Energy Pulse
Energy Pulse.Description: Energy pickups grant '''25% / 30% / 35% / 40% / 45% / 50%''' additional energy over '''10 / 9 / 8 / 7 / 6 / 5''' seconds.

Disorienting Blast.Name: Disorienting Blast
Disorienting Blast.Description: Void Blast has a '''20% / 30% / 40% / 50%''' chance of confusing enemies for '''4s / 8s / 12s / 16s''', causing them to be unable to distinguish friend and foe.

Mind Step.Name: Mind Step
Mind Step.Description: Increase the movement speed of the Operator by '''7% / 15% / 22% / 30% / 30%'''.

Enduring Tides.Name: Enduring Tides
Enduring Tides.Description: Increase health of the Operator by '''25% / 50% / 50% / 150% / 150%'''.

Crippling Dash.Name: Crippling Dash
Crippling Dash.Description: Using Void Dash through an enemy will reduce their damage by''' 20% / 30% / 40% / 50%'''.

Void Radiance.Name: Void Radiance
Void Radiance.Description: Consumes '''25 / 30 / 45 / 50''' energy on leaving Void Mode to blind enemies within '''4 / 6 / 8 / 10'''m for '''2 / 3 / 4 / 5'''s.

Void Hunter.Name: Void Hunter
Void Hunter.Description: Void Mode reveals enemies within '''10m / 12m / 18m / 25m''' through walls. This range gradually decreases over '''2s / 3s / 4s / 5s''' when the Operator leaves Void Mode. This ability costs an additional '''2 / 2 / 1 / 1''' energy per second.

Surging Dash.Name: Surging Dash
Surging Dash.Description: Creates a wave while dashing, increasing the damage by '''5% / 10% / 15% / 20% / 25% / 30%''' and the area of effect around the Operator by '''2m / 4m / 6m / 8m / 10m / 12m'''.

Power Spike.Name: Power Spike
Power Spike.Description: Melee Combo Counter now decays while out of combat by '''20 / 15 / 10 / 5''' every few seconds, instead of depleting completely.

Blazing Dash.Name: Blazing Dash
Blazing Dash.Description: Void Dash leaves a trail of fire that deals '''100 / 200 / 300 / 400 / 600 / 1000''' damage/s over '''3 / 6 / 9 / 12 / 12 / 14'''s. Void Dash will now stun enemies instead of displacing them.

Affinity Spike.Name: Affinity Spike
Affinity Spike.Description: Kills from melee attacks grant '''10% / 15% / 20% / 25% / 35% / 45%''' more affinity.

Void Spines.Name: Void Spines
Void Spines.Description: '''5% / 15% / 25% / 50% / 75% / 100%''' of damage taken is returned to the attacker.
